channel.title: Internet on DillonBaird.io
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on DillonBaird.io

item.title: Confessions of a Progress Bar Addict: The Ecstasy of Waiting
item.description:
Hi, my name is Dillon Baird, and I’m a progress bar-aholic.

There, I said it. It feels good to get that off my chest. It’s a problem, I know. But like any true addiction, I can’t help myself. Those little bars, those tiny digital beacons of hope, they’re my kryptonite.

item.title: Multi-WAN Bonding with OpenMPTCProuter
item.description: Unlike other solutions that claim to aggregate connections, Multi-Path TCP (MPTCP) actually does. See how I accomplished this using 2 Starlink terminals and multiple cellular hotspots

item.title: Cracking Ethernetâ€™s MTU Mystery
item.description: Dive into a digital detective story that unravels the enigmatic choice of Ethernet’s 1500-byte MTU and how 1500 became the MTU of the internet.
